eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib

Class KD_core

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_core

  • public class KD_core
extends java.lang.Object
    Core Class of the tool.
    Author:
    Giovanni Moretti - DH Group FBK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  KD_core.Language
      Enum Type that setups the language of the input files.
      static class  KD_core.Threads
      Enum Type that setups the number of threads used by the tool.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KD_core(KD_core.Threads t)
      Creates an instance of the KD tool with t number of threads
      KD_core(KD_core.Threads t, KD_core.Language lang, KD_configuration configuration)
      Creates an instance of the KD tool with t number of threads , with lang Language and configuration KD_configuration

      • createNewEmptyLanguage

        public void createNewEmptyLanguage(java.lang.String name,
                                   KD_configuration configuration)
        Creates a new folder structure in the languages folder in order to allow the user to set up a custom (not provided) language easily.
        Parameters:
        name - The new language name.
        configuration - KD_configuration object.

      • extractExpressions

        public java.util.LinkedList<KD_keyconcept> extractExpressions(KD_core.Language lang,
                                                              KD_configuration configuration,
                                                              java.lang.String filePath,
                                                              java.lang.StringBuffer fileContent)
        Extracts the key-phrases from data.
        Parameters:
        lang - Language of the input file.
        configuration - KD_configuration object.
        filePath - String with path of the input file.
        fileContent - StringBuffer containing the input data. If it is not null or empty the method uses this variable as data container.
        Returns:
        LinkedList of KD_keyconcept objects.
